definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Never try to be anything you aren’t.
sentences.chinese: 切勿试图成为一个不真实的你。

sentences.english: You must not allow passengers to hold the steering wheel or to lean out of a window.
sentences.chinese: 切勿让乘客握持驾驶盘，或把身体伸出车窗外。

sentences.english: Don't quit the job before you find a new one.
sentences.chinese: 你在未找到新工作之前，切勿辞工。

sentences.english: If you drop something on the trackway , do not attempt to retrieve it!
sentences.chinese: 若您的物品跌落轨道，切勿自行取回。

sentences.english: S41:In case of fire and / or explosion do not breathe fumes.
sentences.chinese: 一旦发生火灾或爆炸，切勿吸入烟雾。

sentences.english: Don't charged inserted, otherwise it might burn out equipment.
sentences.chinese: 切勿带电插拔，否则可能烧坏设备。

sentences.english: NEVER use insect repellents on wounds orirritated skin.
sentences.chinese: 切勿在伤口或发炎的皮肤上使用驱虫剂。

sentences.english: Government warning. Stay clear from birds and never feed them.
sentences.chinese: 奉政府谕，切勿接触或喂饲禽鸟。

sentences.english: You should hang on to those bonds, they'll appreciate considerably.
sentences.chinese: 你切勿卖掉这些债券，它们会很快大幅度上涨的。

sentences.english: In brief, use exceptions properly and never return error codes.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，合理使用异常，切勿返回错误代码。

sentences.english: Never re-fuel a generator when hot, or while the engine is running.
sentences.chinese: 切勿再热燃油发电机时，或在发动机运行。

sentences.english: Never immerse the motor unit in water.
sentences.chinese: 切勿将马达装置浸入水中。

sentences.english: When entering the command, do not use the backslash.
sentences.chinese: 输入命令时切勿使用反斜杠。

sentences.english: Clean the glass with wipes and sop up the water with a towel, do not touch the bulb.
sentences.chinese: 用百洁布清洁玻璃板，切勿让湿的百洁布触碰灯泡。

sentences.english: Keeply look out for vessels and fishing boats not to approach too close to them.
sentences.chinese: 敏锐的瞭望船只和渔船，切勿过于靠拢。

sentences.english: Don't leave it on skin over 10 minutes or let it air-dry on skin.
sentences.chinese: 切勿超过10分钟或让脱毛膏于肌肤上风干。

definition: to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
in order to avoid/so as not to
must/to need to/to be sure to
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
